long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SecurePass Generator is a powerful tool to generate customizable random passwords. Tailor your passwords with uppercase, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters, with lengths ranging from 16 to 128 characters. Each password is automatically copied to your clipboard for convenience. Save and manage your password history, with the ability to clear or export it in JSON or CSV formats, ensuring your digital security with ease
